transcript:
Customer: Hari anant hari katha ananta kahahi sunahi bahu vidhi
Hello
Executive: Hello Shivam ji baat kar rahe hain?
Customer: Haan ji
Executive: Haan Shivam ji namaskar sir Sumeet baat kar raha hu sir mai IndiaMART se kaise ho aap?
Customer: Ji
Executive: Ji actually abhi aapka discussion humne account manager ke sath ho raha tha Hemant ji ke sath to actually aapne uski call ka feedback diya ki aap uski call se discussion se satisfied nahi the.
To isiliye aapne
Customer: Arey mai kaunsi call se to satisfied tha koi aisi baat nahi hai.
Executive: Achha
Customer: Haan lekin bhai mujhe pehle bataya tha usse satisfied nahi hu.
Executive: Kya bataya tha?
Customer: Bhai wohi bataya tha jab starting me jab mujhse karwaya tha na ye to bola tha bhai unlimited calls aayengi aapke pass aapka business aa jayega do mahine me aapke matlab jitne lagaye usse jyada ka business aa jayega. Bhai aisa to kuch nahi hua hai mere sath.
Executive: Sir ji dekho calls to mujhe mai dekh raha hu aapke pass jo abhi tak calls aa rahi hai aap calls hi buyer ki pick kar rahe ho direct inquiry vagera jo aa rahi hai ya jo leads vagera aapke pass aa rahi hai uspe to connect ho nahi raha hai bilkul bhi.
Customer: Bilkul bilkul haan wohi to mere se aisa kuch nahi bataya gaya tha ki aapke buyleads matlab consume karni hai bhai itna to time mere pass dekho hai nahi mai to facebook instagram pe boost maar bhai mere pass itni calls sir aate hai mera business achha chal raha hai koi dikkat nahi hai rajesh.
Executive: Bilkul chal raha hoga.
Customer: Ji
Executive: Hmm hmm batao batao.
Customer: Mere se aisa kuch nahi bataya aapne matlab ye buyleads consume karne honge aapke pass seedhe calls nahi aayengi unhone bola saamne se aapke pass calls aayengi unlimited calls aayengi aapke pass.
Executive: To sir is cheez ka to confirmation aapke pass Priyanshu ne welcome call bhi kari hai aapke sath do baar samjhaya bhi hai sari cheeze online demonstration ki kaise kaise cheeze hoti hai kis tarike se basically buyer opportunity kyuki haan.
Customer: Woh baad me bataya tha lekin jab maine kara tha na ye karne se pehle karne se pehle payment karne se pehle mujhse ye bola tha.
Executive: Hmm hmm sir dekho karne se pehle aapko bola tha usi ke baad jab aapki services live hoti hai isiliye hum sari cheeze aapke clarity bhi wahin pe rakhte hai isiliye hi.
Customer: Clarity aapko pehle karni chahiye na malik.
Executive: Malik bilkul aapki baat sahi hai lekin ek cheez batao na buyer jo buyleads ke through aapke pass Shivam ji buyer aa raha hai woh buyer bhi to wohi hai na jiski kahin na kahin requirement hai.
Aur woh opportunities aapko provide karwa raha hai waha se so that usko aap connect karke apna conversion waha pe nikal paao cheezo ko leke. Jo teen tarike se basically IndiaMART se buyer aapke pass aata hai calls ke through direct inquiry jo aapke pass aati hai ya message ke through ya calls ke through teen tarike se basically buyer approach karta hai jiske saamne Balaji Enterprises customer ke saamne visible hoti hai to aapko message dalta hai ya woh call karta hai ya fir woh IndiaMART ke normal page pe inquiry dalta hai jisse woh aapke portal pe jab aap seller panel apna IndiaMART ka open karte ho waha pe aapko woh dikhti hai.
To har tarike se jab buyer approach kar payega to usi me hi aapki business conversion bhi nikal ke aayenge. Ab mere ko ek cheez batao jaisa aap bata rahe ho ki mere pass facebook se ya mai instagram se business kar raha hu to jo buyer yaha pe aapke pass jo directly aapke portfolio pe jaake inquiry dal raha hai un buyer ka feedback kya hai sir aapka ya calls ke through ya jo normally Balaji Enterprises pe hi jaake aapko inquiry dal raha hai personal.
Customer: Bhai maine jab ye use kiya hai na haan aur jo unka matlab feedback aata hai woh mere se product lete hai.
Haan
Customer: Abhi ek second ruko mai bhi call back karta hu mai.
Executive: Chaliye koi problem nahi hai. Back karke laga lo ise back karke laga do yaha pe.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not satisfied with services.

- Customer was promised unlimited calls.

- Customer says he was not told about buyleads.



Resolution:

- Executive explained about buyleads and process.

- Executive mentioned welcome call and online demonstration.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call back.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, calls, satisfaction
